name: evenly
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: evenly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: If you say something evenly, you speak without showing emotion in your voice although you are angry or not satisfied in some way.

example.eg: "We are not terrorists," he said evenly. "We are freedom fighters."
example.egtrans: “我们不是恐怖分子，”他镇定地说：“我们是自由斗士。”

dsense.name: evenly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: Divide the mixture evenly between the baking pans.
example.egtrans: 将混合物分成等份放在烤盘中。

example.eg: Congress is still evenly divided on the issue.
example.egtrans: 在这个问题上，国会仍旧分成两个阵营，旗鼓相当。
